items.sentence: If I\'d known Tom was going to be here, I wouldn\'t have come.
If I\'d known Tom was in Boston, I\'d have tried to visit him.
If this plan doesn\'t work, we\'ll have to try something else.
You told Tom that he needed to get more exercise, didn\'t you?
Why in a million years would I want to do something like that?
Would you like a drink while we wait for the others to arrive?
Would you please do me the favor of going to the prom with me?
I wanted to ask Tom to come over to help me paint the ceiling.
Tom wasn\'t able to speak French well enough to be understood.
Tom said there were no decent restaurants in his neighborhood.
